repl_description:
A location-based service marketplace platform that connects local service providers with users. The application implements core functionalities including service management, real-time maps integration, provider-client interactions, and a comprehensive request handling system through a Flask-based authentication system.

The platform features vendor profile management with service tags, detailed descriptions, pricing options (hourly/project rates), availability calendars, and profile image capabilities. Service providers can manage their offerings while users can discover and book services through an interactive map-based interface.

Tech Stack:
- Flask (Backend Framework + Authentication)
- JavaScript (Frontend)
- Maps API Integration
- Image Upload Service
